definition: outstanding people/water and fire (in Daoist writing)
dragon/CL:條|条[tiao2]/imperial
surname Long
tiger/CL:隻|只[zhi1]
fight between powerful contenders

sentences.english: Cats and snakes are traditionally cooked together (in the south only), given the name "dragon tiger fight".
sentences.chinese: 猫和蛇通常一起做，名字叫“龙虎斗”。

sentences.english: What is the Battle Between the Dragon and the Tiger?
sentences.chinese: 龙虎斗是一道什么样的菜？

sentences.english: It was the role in a television series 21 Jump Street .
sentences.chinese: 那是在电视影集《龙虎少年队》里的一个角色。

sentences.english: Dragon and Tiger Mountain is one of Chinese best sights combining mountain and water.
sentences.chinese: 龙虎山是中国山和水结合最好的景区之一。

sentences.english: This fairy and Taoism consciousness gives a deep influence to thoughts of the God's teacher mansion building in the Dragon—tiger Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 这一仙道意识，深刻影响了龙虎山天师府建筑思想。

sentences.english: The final showdown between good and evil is a spectacular battle that shakes the walls of Tiger Dragon Gate.
sentences.chinese: 一场正义与邪恶的终极之战震动龙虎门。

sentences.english: The most famous dish, Dragon and Tiger Fight, is a dish of braised snake and leopard.
sentences.chinese: 粤菜里最有名是“龙虎斗”，也就是炖蛇肉和豹肉。

sentences.english: The brewing method of fight between dragon and tiger tea is also very special.
sentences.chinese: 纳西族喝的“龙虎斗”，制作方法也很奇特。

sentences.english: The only survivor is Ma Xiaoling, who gets rescued by Dragon Wong, and is brought to Dragon Tiger Gate.
sentences.chinese: 马小灵幸免遇难，被王小龙救出并送去龙虎门武馆。

sentences.english: Make dragon tiger surrender tame and docile.
All the latest chart topping hits, and everything else you call entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 所有最新的龙虎榜，其他一切都是你叫娱乐。

sentences.english: Through the Jinshui Bridge, and along the steps of, is the dragon and tiger Dian.
sentences.chinese: 穿过金水桥，沿石阶而上，便是龙虎殿。

definition: Lord of profound heaven, major Daoist deity/aka Black Tortoise 玄武 or Black heavenly emperor 玄天上帝

Azure Dragon, one of the four symbols of the Chinese constellations, also known as the Azure Dragon of the East 東方青龍|东方青龙[Dong1 fang1 Qing1 long2] or 東方蒼龍|东方苍龙[Dong1 fang1 Cang1 long2]/(slang) man without pubic hair
black/mysterious
Black Tortoise (the seven mansions of the north sky)/(in Daoism) God of the north sky
Qixing district of Guilin city 桂林市[Gui4 lin2 shi4], Guangxi
Tianmen sub-prefecture level city in Hubei
White Tiger (the seven mansions of the west sky)/(slang) hairless female genitalia

four divinities/four divine emperors/four mythical creatures symbolic of prosperity and longevity, namely the phoenix 鳳|凤[feng4], turtle 龜|龟[gui1], dragon 龍|龙[long2] and Chinese unicorn 麒麟[qi2 lin2]/also 四象[si4 xiang4], the four division of the sky

four divisions (of the twenty-eight constellations 二十八宿[er4 shi2 ba1 xiu4] of the sky into groups of seven mansions), namely: Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙[Qing1 long2], White Tiger 白虎[Bai2 hu3], Vermilion Bird 朱雀[Zhu1 que4], Black Tortoise 玄武[Xuan2 wu3]
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
main mountain of a region
Taixu (famed Buddhist monk, 1890-1947)
great emptiness/the void/heaven/the skies/universe/cosmos/original essence of the cosmos
mystery known only to heaven (archaic)/inscrutable twist of fate/fig. top secret
to subdue a tiger/fig. to prevail over sinister forces
yin and yang
Vermilion Bird (the seven mansions of the south sky)
